description:
The entire school is possessed and drawn into the old schoolhouse, all to lure Satsuki and the gang into a trap. Lord Ohma has awoken, and seeks vengence upon Satsuki for her family`s past attempts to seal him. In this final confrontation, who will emerge?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Farewell, Amanojaku - The Descent of Ohma
さらば天の邪鬼 逢魔降臨
